uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize.separation

Interface Separation


  • public interface Separation
    Interface for something that solves separation problems.
    Author:
    Uli Schlachter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Region calculateSeparatingRegion(State state, State otherState)
      Calculate a region solving some state separation problem.
      Region calculateSeparatingRegion(State state, java.lang.String event)
      Get a region solving some event/state separation problem.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateSeparatingRegion

        Region calculateSeparatingRegion(State state,
                                 State otherState)
        Calculate a region solving some state separation problem.
        Parameters:
        state - The first state of the separation problem
        otherState - The second state of the separation problem
        Returns:
        A region solving the problem or null.

      • calculateSeparatingRegion

        Region calculateSeparatingRegion(State state,
                                 java.lang.String event)
        Get a region solving some event/state separation problem.
        Parameters:
        state - The state of the separation problem
        event - The event of the separation problem
        Returns:
        A region solving the problem or null.
